headline: Fullstack Web Developer at @BioQuality | ReactJS ¬∑ DRF¬∑ Figma ¬∑ UML ¬∑ UI/UX | Software Engineering | Creating Software Solutions
about: Full-stack Web Developer experienced in building and optimizing applications. Focused in improve users experience and reducing cost with software solutions.At Bioquality, I use Django and JavaScript for automating workflows resulting in efficiency improvement in some internal processes. I lead prototyping, development and deployment process using Django REST Framework, React.js, UML, Figma, Git and GitHub.My formation includes CS50's ‚Äì Web Development With Python and JavaScript ‚Äì from Harvard, participation at ICPC Programming Contest and Software Engineering at UEPA.What I did:- Used Django and JavaScript for automating workflows;- Designed and prototyped UI with Figma;- Implemented systems modeling with UML for improving software documentation;- Guided an intern in the frontend development process.Core technologies & tools:- Backend: Django, Django REST Framework, Python, APIs;- Frontend: React.js, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, SASS;- UI/UX & Design: Figma, UI/UX principles, prototyping;- Tools: Git, GitHub, UML, Postman.I'm always into new challenges. Currently I'm studying React.js and some concepts about React Native.Let's connect! You can email me or check out my work on GitHub.üìß Email: feliperaphaelpara@gmail.com üåê GitHub: https://github.com/frcelipe7

experience.position: Full Stack Web Developer | Django REST ¬∑ ReactJS ¬∑ Figma ¬∑ UML ¬∑ SASS ¬∑ JavaScript
experience.summary:
As a Full Stack Web Developer, I am responsible for the planning, creation, maintenance, and enhancement of software applications and systems. I leverage my skills in both frontend and backend development to build scalable, high-performing web applications. Working with technologies such as Django REST, ReactJS, and JavaScript, I ensure seamless integration between components, while focusing on delivering user-friendly, visually appealing interfaces. I contributed to the development of a scheduling and attendance platform for internal management, aiming to improve operational efficiency.Key responsibilities:- Providing support and guidance to an intern in project development and skill improvement;- Prototyped and designed interfaces using Figma, contributing to efficient design processes and collaboration with stakeholders;- Focused on UI/UX design principles to enhance user engagement and retention, improving the overall user experience;- Improved the speed of several websites by identifying bottlenecks and optimizing their performance using performance testing tools, significantly improving their loading times and performance;- Led code collaboration and versioning using Git and GitHub, ensuring streamlined development and effective teamwork;- Utilized UML (Unified Modeling Language) to model systems and processes, improving communication and clarity during development and project planning.
            

    
    

    
        Show less

experience.position: Intern Web Developer | Django ¬∑ JavaScript ¬∑ Python ¬∑ HTML ¬∑ CSS
experience.summary:
As an Intern Web Developer, I gained practical experience building dynamic and responsive web applications using Django, JavaScript, and Python, ensuring seamless integration between front and backend components. During my internship, I contributed to the development of software solutions, including a personal evaluation system and a certification platform, both aimed at addressing the company‚Äôs needs. Key responsibilities:- Developed a Personal Evaluation System that helped the company reduce operational costs and improve student services by providing better data management and personalized evaluation processes- Developed backend features and functionalities using Django and Python, ensuring efficient and scalable code;- Designed and implemented responsive user interfaces with HTML, CSS, and Figma, enhancing user experience across devices;- Contributed to performance improvements by optimizing both frontend and backend processes, enhancing the speed and responsiveness of applications;- Participated in team meetings and collaborative discussions to plan, track, and meet project milestones, ensuring alignment with goals and deadlines.
            

    
    

    
        Show less

As an Administrative Assistant, I was responsible for providing administrative support to ensure the smooth running of daily office operations. My role included handling office correspondence, organizing meetings, managing schedules, and assisting in various administrative tasks. I also supported the team with document management, data entry, and customer service, contributing to overall efficiency and helping the organization meet its operational goals.
